title: Creep
lyrics:
Creep on the train
He won't stay away
Creep on the train
Filming me, you insane?
Creep on the train

Scum of [?] in his brain

Creep on the train

I really want to smash your head in





Creep on the train

With his creepy gold chain

Creep on the train

With his dirty trouser stain



Creep on the train

Scum of [?] in his brain

Creep on the train

I really want to smash your head in

I want to smash your head in

I - smash your head right in

Right in

Right in

Right in
